SCTX - Script Source:
SCN	mwMusicianScript

short ChunaPlayingLute
short FathusaPlayingLute
short MuvisPlayingLute
short FalenaPlayingLute
short TandramPlayingLute
short BralasPlayingDrum
Short randint

begin gamemode

;This script is to control the actual music when musicians are playing. 
;You can see that for each musician, it checks their current ai package (16 = Useitemat), 
;whether the music is already playing (indicated by the variable NPCNAMEPlayingLute], 
;whether the player is currently in the same cell as the musician, 
;and a location check to see if the NPC is where they are supposed to be. 
;The location check prevents the music from playing before the NPC has 
;actually reached the place where they will be performing the correct animation. 

;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; Script for Chuna, Argonian in Balmora, Lucky Lockup.  Lute player. 
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


	if GameHour >= 16 && GameHour <= 24 && ChunaREF.GetCurrentAIPackage != 16
		ChunaREF.evp
	endif
	if ChunaPlayingLute == 1
		if ChunaREF.GetCurrentAIPackage != 16 || ChunaREF.GetSitting != 3 || Player.GetInCell "BalmoraVSLuckySLockup" == 0 || Player.IsWaiting == 1  || IsPCSleeping == 1
			StreamMusic Public
			set ChunaPlayingLute to 0
		endif
	endif		
	If ChunaREF.GetCurrentAIPackage ==16 && ChunaPlayingLute == 0 && Player.GetInCell "BalmoraVSLuckySLockup" == 1 &&  ChunaREF.GetSitting == 3 
		StreamMusic "data\music\5min-silence.mp3"
		set randint to Rand 1 5
		if randint <=2
			ChunaREF.PlaySound3D LuteFolk01
		endif
		if randint > 2 && randint <=3
			ChunaREF.PlaySound3D LuteFolk02
		endif
		if randint > 3 && randint <=4
			ChunaREF.PlaySound3D LuteFolk03
		endif
		if randint >4
			ChunaREF.PlaySound3D LuteFolk04
		endif
		set ChunaPlayingLute to 1
	endif

;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;Script for Fathusa, Dark Elf in Ald'Ruhn's Ald Skar Inn. Ald-ruhn, if you prefer.  Lute player. 
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	if FathusaPlayingLute == 1
		if mwFathusaGirethiREF.GetCurrentAIPackage != 16 || Player.GetInCell "AldtruhnVSAldSSkarSInn" == 0 || Player.IsWaiting == 1  || IsPCSleeping == 1 || mwFathusaGirethiREF.GetDistance FathusaPlaysLuteHere >= 100
			StreamMusic Public
			set FathusaPlayingLute to 0
		endif
	endif

	If mwFathusaGirethiREF.GetCurrentAIPackage ==16 && FathusaPlayingLute == 0 && Player.GetInCell "AldtruhnVSAldSSkarSInn" == 1 && mwFathusaGirethiREF.GetDistance FathusaPlaysLuteHere < 100
		StreamMusic "data\music\5min-silence.mp3"
		set randint to Rand 1 5
		if randint <=2
			mwFathusaGirethiREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud01
		endif
		if randint > 2 && randint <=3
			mwFathusaGirethiREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud02
		endif
		if randint > 3 && randint <=4
			mwFathusaGirethiREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud03
		endif
		if randint >4
			mwFathusaGirethiREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud04
		endif
		set FathusaPlayingLute to 1
		;Message "Fathusa is playing", 10
	endif

;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;Script for Muvis, Dark Elf at Desele's House of Earthly Delights, in Suran.  Lute player. 
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


	if MuvisPlayingLute == 1
		if MuvisREF.GetCurrentAIPackage != 16 || MuvisREF.GetSitting != 3 || Player.GetInCell "SuranVSDeseleAsSHouseSofSEarthlySDelights" == 0 || Player.IsWaiting == 1  || IsPCSleeping == 1
			StreamMusic Public
			set MuvisPlayingLute to 0
		endif
	endif		
	If MuvisREF.GetCurrentAIPackage ==16 && MuvisPlayingLute == 0 && Player.GetInCell "SuranVSDeseleAsSHouseSofSEarthlySDelights" == 1 &&  MuvisREF.GetSitting == 3 
		StreamMusic "data\music\5min-silence.mp3"
		set randint to Rand 1 5
		if randint <=2
			MuvisREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud01
		endif
		if randint > 2 && randint <=3
			MuvisREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud02
		endif
		if randint > 3 && randint <=4
			MuvisREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud03
		endif
		if randint >4
			MuvisREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud04
		endif
		set MuvisPlayingLute to 1
	endif
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; Script for Falena, Dark Elf in Fara's Hole in the Wall, Sadrith Mora. Lute player. 
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


	if FalenaPlayingLute == 1
		if Falena.GetCurrentAIPackage != 16 || Falena.GetDistance xFalenasLuteSpot >= 100 || Player.GetInCell "SadrithSMoraVSFaraAsSHoleSinStheSwall" == 0 || Player.IsWaiting == 1  || IsPCSleeping == 1
			StreamMusic Public
			set FalenaPlayingLute to 0
		endif
	endif		
	If Falena.GetCurrentAIPackage ==16 && FalenaPlayingLute == 0 && Player.GetInCell "SadrithSMoraVSFaraAsSHoleSinStheSwall" == 1 &&  Falena.GetDistance xFalenasLuteSpot <= 100
		StreamMusic "data\music\5min-silence.mp3"
		set randint to Rand 1 5
		if randint <= 2
			Falena.PlaySound3D LuteOud01
		endif
		if randint > 2 && randint <=3
			Falena.PlaySound3D LuteOud02
		endif
		if randint > 3 && randint <=4
			Falena.PlaySound3D LuteOud03
		endif
		if randint > 4
			Falena.PlaySound3D LuteOud04
		endif
		set FalenaPlayingLute to 1
	endif

;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;Script for Tandram, Dark elf at Arrille's Tradehouse, Seyda Neen Lute player. 
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


	if TandramPlayingLute == 1
		if TandramREF.GetCurrentAIPackage != 16 || Player.GetInCell "SeydaSNeenVSArrilleAssTradehouse" == 0 || Player.IsWaiting == 1  || IsPCSleeping == 1
			StreamMusic Public
			set TandramPlayingLute to 0
		endif
	endif		
	If TandramREF.GetCurrentAIPackage ==16 && TandramPlayingLute == 0 && Player.GetInCell "SeydaSNeenVSArrilleAssTradehouse" == 1
		StreamMusic "data\music\5min-silence.mp3"
		set randint to Rand 1 5
		if randint <=2
			TandramREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud01
		endif
		if randint > 2 && randint <=3
			TandramREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud02
		endif
		if randint > 3 && randint <=4
			TandramREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud03
		endif
		if randint >4
			TandramREF.PlaySound3D LuteOud04
		endif
		set TandramPlayingLute to 1
	endif

;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
;Script for Bralas Mels, Dark Elf in Ald'Ruhn's Ald Skar Inn.  Drum player. 
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	if BralasPlayingDrum == 1
		if BralasREF.GetCurrentAIPackage != 16 || Player.GetInCell "AldtruhnVSAldSSkarSInn" == 0 || Player.IsWaiting == 1  || IsPCSleeping == 1 || BralasREF.GetDistance BralasPlaysDrumsHere >= 100
			StreamMusic Public
			set BralasPlayingDrum to 0
		endif
	endif		
	If BralasREF.GetCurrentAIPackage ==16 && BralasPlayingDrum == 0 && Player.GetInCell "AldtruhnVSAldSSkarSInn" == 1 && BralasREF.GetDistance BralasPlaysDrumsHere < 100
		StreamMusic "data\music\5min-silence.mp3"
		BralasREF.PlaySound3D DrumDarb01	
		set BralasPlayingDrum to 1
	endif


End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 5731 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
